---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
cars <- read_csv("car_dekho_details.csv")
head(cars)
```

```{r}
clean_cars <- cars %>% 
  select(-name) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>% 
  mutate(fuel = as.factor(fuel)) %>% 
  mutate(seller_type = as.factor(seller_type)) %>% 
  mutate(transmission = as.factor(transmission)) %>% 
  mutate(owner = as.factor(owner))
```

```{r}
summary(clean_cars)
```
```{r}
alias(clean_cars)
```

```{r}
library(caret)
```
```{r}
model <- lm(selling_price ~ ., data = clean_cars)
summary(model)
```
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(model)
```
```{r}
library(broom)
```
```{r}
glance(model)
```
```{r}
library(GGally)
```
```{r}
clean_cars %>% 
  select(-year) %>% 
  ggpairs()
```
